name: The Challenge of Pegasus
overview: Fortunate were those whose life was spent among the royalty of Mount Olympus. Here lived Zeus, Athena and their son, Perseus. Perseus was sent to rid the earth of the evil Gorgon Medusa. Unfortunately, Perseus was unsuccessful in his attempt and was held prisoner by the Medusa. Zeus commissioned the famed winged horse, Pegasus, to rescue his son. Having none of this, the Medusa imprisoned Pegasus in a huge cavern. Meanwhile, the Medusa delivered twenty gold chalices to Mount Olympus. Upon their arrival, the chalices turned into fierce dragons! Published in Loadstar #065.
